name: NATIONAL ENVIRONMENTAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION'S CLEAN AIR PROJECT
sampleDescriptions: New Source Review Permitting Reform (begin actual construction) and refrigerant management rulemaking revisions (NEDA/CAP v. EPA D.C. Cir. Case No. 17-1016 pending).
Schedule for New Source Review rule and guidance issuance and OMB review of same.
Provides list of questions/issues re  S. 2754 (before Chairman Barrasso's Environment and Public Work Committee) re schedule for phaseout of certain hydrofluorocarbons used as refrigerants.
